knimeNode.name: FileLoader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node loads one or two input file(s) and serves as a starting point for any NGS workflow.

fullDescription.intro: This node loads one or two input file(s) and serves as a starting point for any NGS workflow.
fullDescription.option: Choose an input file in BAM/SAM, fastQ or VCF format.
A second fastQ file can be given for the analysis of paired end reads.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: loaded file
Cell 1 (optional): second fastQ file
